mapper.insert: INSERT INTO withdraw (withdraw_id,owner_id, withdraw_type_id, withdraw_method_id, transaction_id, parent_transaction_id, uuid, withdraw_money, arrive_money, money_before_withdraw, money_after_withdraw, bank_account_id, bank_account, begin_time, end_time, in_order_id, out_order_id, total_request, success_request, fail_request, current_status, data, commission, commission_type, commission_charge_type,trade_version,member_no,cur_channel_request_no,channel_status,manual_type,trade_source,withdraw_mode,payee_type, business_code) VALUES (#{withdrawId},#{ownerId}, #{withdrawTypeId}, #{withdrawMethodId}, #{transactionId}, #{parentTransactionId}, #{uuid}, #{withdrawMoney}, #{arriveMoney}, #{moneyBeforeWithdraw}, #{moneyAfterWithdraw}, #{bankAccountId}, #{bankAccount, javaType=BankAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{inOrderId}, #{outOrderId}, #{totalRequest}, #{successRequest}, #{failRequest}, #{currentStatus}, #{data, javaType=HashMap, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commission}, #{commissionType}, #{commissionChargeType}, #{tradeVersion}, #{memberNo}, #{curChannelRequestNo}, #{channelStatus}, #{manualType}, #{tradeSource}, #{withdrawMode}, #{payeeType}, #{businessCode})
mapper.sql: a.transaction_id, a.parent_transaction_id, a.withdraw_type_id, a.withdraw_method_id, a.uuid, a.withdraw_money, a.arrive_money, a.money_before_withdraw, a.money_after_withdraw, a.bank_account_id, a.bank_account, a.begin_time, a.end_time, a.in_order_id, a.out_order_id, a.total_request, a.success_request, a.fail_request, a.current_status, a.data, a.commission, a.commission_type, a.commission_charge_type, a.owner_id, a.trade_version, a.member_no, a.cur_channel_request_no, a.channel_status, a.manual_type, a.trade_source, a.payee_type, a.withdraw_mode, a.business_code
mapper.update:
UPDATE withdraw SET parent_transaction_id = #{parentTransactionId}, withdraw_type_id = #{withdrawTypeId}, withdraw_method_id = #{withdrawMethodId}, uuid = #{uuid}, withdraw_money = #{withdrawMoney}, arrive_money = #{arriveMoney}, money_before_withdraw = #{moneyBeforeWithdraw}, money_after_withdraw = #{moneyAfterWithdraw}, bank_account_id = #{bankAccountId}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,javaType=BankAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, in_order_id = #{inOrderId}, out_order_id = #{outOrderId}, total_request = #{totalRequest}, success_request = #{successRequest}, fail_request = #{failRequest}, current_status = #{currentStatus}, data = #{data,javaType=HashMap, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commission = #{commission}, commission_type = #{commissionType}, commission_charge_type = #{commissionChargeType},
cur_channel_request_no = #{curChannelRequestNo},
channel_status = #{channelStatus},
withdraw_mode = #{withdrawMode},
manual_type = #{manualType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_code = #{businessCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM withdraw AS a LEFT JOIN bank_account AS b ON a.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id WHERE a.transaction_id = #{transactionId}

SELECT
FROM withdraw AS a LEFT JOIN bank_account AS b ON a.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id WHERE a.cur_channel_request_no = #{curChannelRequestNo}

SELECT
FROM withdraw AS a LEFT JOIN bank_account AS b ON a.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id
ORDER BY begin_time DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM withdraw AS a LEFT JOIN bank_account AS b ON a.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id
